    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="es">Ejercicios de tiempo y ángulos con un reloj</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises about time and angles with a clock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen über Zeit und Winkel mit einem 
Taktgeber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices au sujet de temps et angles avec une 
horloge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios sobre o tempo e ângulos com um pulso 
de disparo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni circa tempo ed angoli con un 
orologio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις για το χρόνο και γωνίες με ένα ρολόι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación que permite comprobar soluciones de problemas relativos a ángulos entre manecillas de un reloj y horas</string>
            <string language="en">simulation which allows the user to check the solutions to problems about angles between the hands of a clock and times</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulo</string>
            <string language="en">angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">grados</string>
            <string language="en">degrees</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">horas</string>
            <string language="en">hours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tiempo</string>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">manecillas</string>
            <string language="en">hands</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">reloj</string>
            <string language="en">clock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation, die dem Benutzer erlaubt, die 
Lösungen zu den Problemen über Winkel zwischen den Händen eines 
Taktgebers und den Zeiten zu überprüfen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation qui permet à l'utilisateur de 
contrôler les solutions aux problèmes au sujet des angles entre les 
mains d'une horloge et les moments</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação que permite que o usuário verifique 
as soluções aos problemas sobre ângulos entre as mãos de um pulso 
de disparo e épocas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione che permette che l'utente controlli le
soluzioni ai problemi circa gli angoli fra le mani di un orologio ed i
periodi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να ελέγξει 
τις λύσεις στα προβλήματα για τις γωνίες μεταξύ των χεριών ενός 
ρολογιού και των χρόνων</string>
          </description>
